hero.title: Honest repairs and maintenance you can rely on
hero.subtitle: Family owned since 1985. Same-day service on most repairs with nationwide warranty.

services.title: Complete auto repair
services.subtitle: Maintenance for every make and model

items.title: Advanced diagnostics
items.description: Check engine lights, electrical issues, and drivability problems solved fast.

items.title: Brakes and suspension
items.description: OEM or OEM-equivalent parts with lifetime pad warranty.

items.title: Engine and transmission
items.description: Rebuilds, replacements, and preventative maintenance backed by warranty.

items.title: Fleet maintenance
items.description: Customized service schedules and pickup and delivery for commercial fleets.

about.title: Your neighborhood service center
about.body: Precision Auto Care combines dealership-level diagnostics with the personal attention of a family-run shop. Every technician is ASE certified, we use digital inspections to show you exactly what we see, and we never recommend a repair you do not need.

items.quote: Transparent pricing and they texted photos of everything before doing the work.
items.author: Jared P., Honda Owner

items.quote: Our delivery vans stay on the road thanks to their fleet maintenance program.
items.author: Monique L., Operations Manager

items.quote: Finally a shop that listens. Repairs were finished the same day.
items.author: Henry C., BMW Owner

plans.name: Digital Inspection + Oil Change
plans.description: Full synthetic oil, filter, and 40-point inspection with photos.

plans.name: Brake Package
plans.description: Pads, rotors, and fluid flush for most sedans and SUVs.

plans.name: Fleet PM Plan
plans.description: Monthly maintenance for up to 10 vehicles with priority scheduling.

contact.title: Ready to keep you moving
contact.subtitle: Open Monday through Saturday with early bird drop-off and after-hours pickup.

footer.text: Precision Auto Care. Nationwide warranty through TechNet.
